reviews.reviewTitle: 1/5 star for Seller, 5/5 for camera. Mechanical failure + not providing a refund
reviews.reviewText:
Imagine ordering you first ever professional camera with saved money to pursue photography, and find that the "refurbished" device has mechanical problems. I'm getting Error 20 which means it has to be serviced again due to mechanical failure. There was only bubble-wrap packaging around the main camera body. Everything else was just stuffed in there including the expensive, fragile lens. No wonder there was mechanical damage. I was very excited and got let down.

Update: Ordered refurbished from a different seller, and that one works perfectly. Camera is great!

Update2: Seller is not approving my $350 refund after this review

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks and works just like brand new.
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this refurb because it is almost 20% less than the new one while it has the same 1 year warranty from Canon.
T6 is one of the smallest and lightest DSLRs. It is a great beginner's DSLR. Takes wonderful photo.
I had a canon T5 before, which has no Wi-Fi. Canon T6 replaces the Canon T5. The main differences are: Canon T6 has Wifi and a Digic 4+ processor while Canon T5 has no Wi-Wi and a basic Digic 4 processor.

I was worried at first because it is a refurbished product but I am more than pleased with my purchase, especially since this is my first good camera. I take it everywhere with me and I am still practicing but it is a really easy camera to use and it’s easy to get the hang of!

reviews.reviewTitle: So very happy with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: So very happy with my purchase! looks brand new, camera takes great shots. Packaged well, I ordered this friday and came in the NEXT day!!

Love the camera. Works perfectly. Nothing wrong with the camera and have been taking pictures with it since the day I bought it, looks and feels brand new. It arrived in its original packaging and there is not even a tiny surface scratch on the body considering that it is refurbished. I am an amateur photographer and will be using this camera for astronomy as well as other events such as vacations, but this camera is simple to use.
Camera came right on time, everything that should have came with it was in the box... I love it!

LOVE my canon. I had a Nikon d3000 before and this feels like a total upgrade. (I hardly use my old camera anymore, this one is so much better.) It's great for low lighting and the price is correct. Pretty quality videos, too. I bought it refurbished but it looks and works like new.

This camera came in perfect condition! It was wrapped super nicely and seemed brand new. This camera is pretty easy to understand for beginners like myself. Fully automatic shooting is a great way to start before you learn about the manual controls.

reviews.reviewTitle: Disappointed - Probably won't trust Certified Refurbished again.
reviews.reviewText:
Disclaimer: I'm reviewing this "Certified Refurbished" product, not the Canon Rebel T6 camera itself (which I was starting to love!)

This arrived today, and I followed all the instructions. I charged the battery while reading the manual (about 2 hours). When the battery light turned green, I put everything together and got started taking test shots. Almost immediately, I got an error saying to change the battery pack. I was sure the battery was fully charged, but I plugged it in for another 2 hours! *Both times, the display indicated a full battery.*
I managed to play with the camera for about half an hour, while still getting the error message. Turning the camera off and on seemed to help, but any time I'd try to adjust a setting, it would give me an error. I had enough time with the camera to decide I wanted it! I just wanted it to work.

I read other negative reviews that complained about this seller. So I didn't even bother dealing with them. I went right to Amazon and as always (in my experience) they were very helpful. I followed the process for exchanges / returns, and a customer service rep helped me trouble shoot the camera. He concluded that there was a fault with the mechanism, and proceeded to ask my preferences for refund and shipping methods.

It sucks that I have to wait longer for a new camera, but I'm just starting out, so what's a few more days?

This camera arrived in mint condition. Came with the strap, charger, cable, and battery. Takes beautiful pictures and easy to set up the WiFi connection. Everything works just fine and I am beyond excited to take more and more photos with this and get better at photography. I used to be on the edge about buying refurbished but every canon camera I’ve bought refurbished have always worked out fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Got more than I bargained for..
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes me as a consumer focus on the negative, and those are things to point out so that things can improve, but I also like to point out the positive things as well. This item was a refurbished item and I have to say, when you hear refurb. you think of ok, its packed in a no label box, maybe with some bubble wrap, but this item can in MINT condition, I would not know it was a refurb. unless I say the tag, the item was like new, packed in its original box, with charger, battery, strap everything was well packed like it came out of Canon. We purchased this camera mainly for family events, and memories, we just had a new baby and are looking to move away from our smartphone camera usage :-), I know its convenience is great, uploaded photos, etc., but we wanted something more high quality, with better exposure, sharpest, etc., this is a great beginner camera, one of the things we did was took some online how to's, and let me tell you they help a ton. We went all out, got some backdrops, extra battery, since this was a refrub., we also got an extended warranty (wasnt very expensive), this is a great camera, the price from the seller was fantastic, cant be beat. Highly recommend. Also let me point out this does have wifi which you can transfer the high quality photos to your smartphone and uploaded it to the cloud, and NFC. Hope this helps with your buying decision.

I received this camera and gave it as a gift, the Wi-Fi function didn't work when she set it up. I reached out to the seller and they told me to get with the manufacturer and gave me the 1-800 do call them! The seller is junk! I'd definitely buy from somebody else, I've tried to contact them another three times without a response.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... before I bought this camera that it is a good camera, but that didn't stop me from being ...
reviews.reviewText: I already knew before I bought this camera that it is a good camera, but that didn't stop me from being surprisingly impressed with it once I got it. This is an awesome camera. I am not a professional photographer, but this camera takes amazing pictures and is so easy to use and so versatile. The automatic settings are great for quick on-the-fly picture taking, and the manual settings really open up the possibilities for getting that perfect shot. I am also impressed with the quality of video, though not as impressed with the built-in microphone. I use my camera indoors and outdoors for events, portraits, product photography, and general purpose photography. The lens that it comes with is good for general purpose photography, but I did buy a nice telephoto lens and a macro lens for more advanced photography.
Camera just quit working about the 4th or 5th time using it. Tried new batteries and still doesn't turn on. Have no way of contacting sellers to see if they have any support for this issue.

This is my first camera ever. I decided to buy a camera for my trip to LA and San Fran coming up. I just received my package (even thought I should've gotten it yesterday..) anyways the camera is like brand new and works GREAT. I took my first two photos and I was amazed by the quality of it. It comes with the lens, strap, camera body, battery, charger and USB to transfer your photos on your computer. The best part of this camera is the wifi and how easy it is to transfer photos to your smart phone. I can post nice Pics on my social media super fast. I love it!!!!!

I love love love this camera. It's my first more professional quality camera and it's a lot of fun to learn on. If it doesn't take good pictures, perhaps it's a problem with the user. ;) Play with the settings, use charts from pinterest to try to understand what the settings do and mean. There's a physiology to the whole thing, and it's super cool! Work hard and you'll get great results. It's perfect for luggin' around and getting some good shots.

This camera is perfect for beginners. This is my third time rebuying this camera (I had to sell the other 2 because my early 20’s have really kicked my butt) It allows you to gradually ease yourself into adjusting every setting one by one until you’re comfortable enough to operate in full manual mode. Each time you choose something it has offers tips and explanations of how each adjustment will affect the photo. It also had the option to intergrate a really neat canon app on your phone so you can have live view through your lens Incase you want to take self portraits. I have always used canon products and have never been disappointed.

I am so happy with this! It is new! For a beginner it’s awesome. Both lenses work great the AF is a plus for people who are starting with photography. Lenses change easy. The manual it’s easy to understand and finding the settings in the camera is also easy as it is Connecting it to WiFi and cellphone. The price is reasonable. Definitely give it a try.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worth every penny. Perfect for beginners.
reviews.reviewText: I could not be more of a beginner when it comes to photography and DSLR cameras. This is perfect. It works perfectly and you would never know it's refurbished. I wanted to get a better camera for hopefully travel blog purposes and this camera is the perfect investment. I can't speak to any advanced features. But if you're like me and want something high quality that has enough bells and whistles to make a noticeable impact in your images--but not too many that it becomes overwhelming or confusing--this camera is for you. And I LOVEEE the wifi feature. 10/10 would recommend.

I love this camera! I’ve been photography has been my hobby for the past couple years and wanted to do more with ISO, Focus, Aperture, Shutter speed and so on. My other camera did none of these things so I needed an upgrade, problem is I don’t have a ton of money and I was worried a camera this “cheap” was not going to be good. However this is possibly the best bang for your buck you can get! I have loved this camera and it has done me quite well. I would recommend however disabling the automatic flash, I think flash ruins things. I have had it for a few months and haven’t found a troubled with it so far. Battery lasts a long time and the quality picture you get all depends on you. Nice easy dial for changing settings fast during shoots. Really though, if you use this camera correctly, you’ll get a banging picture.

In the last year or so I started becoming more interested in photography, and began searching for a good beginner camera. The rebel t6 is the one I went with. I love how easy it is to use, especially when using Wi-Fi to connect to your phone. For a beginner camera this is great quality, and I love to bring it everywhere with me. The built in flash works well, and the picture quality is good for the price. I didn't really know what I would get when buying a refurbished camera off Amazon, but the packaging was very neat and the camera itself looked brand new, no blemishes or anything. I've had this camera for several months now and I am so happy with my purchaseI!

I started out with a rebel I believe I know it was a canon and pretty sure it was a rebel lol.
Anyway I love this camera!
It is super easy point and click! you can change the settings and the shutter speed is amazing!
I had bought a nikon thinking I'd like to try it, Nope!
Hated that nikon the shutter speed was slow and the wifi transfer app to my phone was soooo slow.
The canon app for transferring your pictures to your phone is soooo awesome and quick and easy!!!
Great instructions!!!
Can be a complex camera or a point and click! super easy to use.
Totally recommended I love mine especially for taking fast moving pictures which is 99% of what I take!

reviews.reviewTitle: A perfect Beginner's DSLR in a small and lightweight body
reviews.reviewText:
To start off this review, let’s first take a look at the build quality of this lens.
The first thing you’re going to notice is just how small this camera is for a dslr. The T6 is one of the smallest DSLR’s you can buy from Canon and pretty much any company for that matter. But to me, that’s not a bad thing. Being a very lightweight camera can sometimes mean you’re more inclined to pick it up and take it out with you, rather than being worried that’s it’s going to be too heavy. On the top of the camera right here we’ve got all of the buttons that’ you’d expect to see on a beginner dslr and also this mode dial which allows you to select the mode you want to be in. Of course you’ve got all of the basic beginner modes, like sports and portraits etc, but also aperture, shutter and manual modes for when you want to get a little bit more advanced. So overall the camera’s build is good for what it is, a lightweight dslr, but i’d always be a little bit careful with this type of body. It is however missing something that I really do like to see and that’s an articulating screen. The screen itself is actually pretty nice, but i’d like to see those improvements made in the next camera. If you’ve ever used a Canon camera before you’ll feel right at home with the menu system. It’s incredible easy to get around and change the settings you need. Wifi and NFC allows you to do is connect your camera to your phone and do a number of things like transfer your photos and also get a live view of what your shooting. To me this is the perfect camera to have this feature, because it’s targeting a younger generation of users who love to share their photos on instagram and Facebook. The Canon T6 isn’t super quick and can only shoot 3 shots per second. Now most of the time when you take a photo you’ll only be taking one shot anyway so it won’t make a big difference, but if you want to take some photos at a sports game or of a bird, this might not be the best camera for you. Autofocus in stills mode is actually surprisingly good, it’s snappy and should be fast enough for most situations. Now the lens that comes with the camera isn’t great, and is noisy in autofocus, but if you can get passed the noise, which sounds bit like a bee, it’ll work pretty well in well lit situations.

So let’s talk about price and more importantly value for money.
Now the T6 comes in at $549, which is one of the cheapest DSLR’s you can buy on the market today. but still this at amazon you will get refurbished one with saving 200$ is not bad option. it comes with great packaging as you can see in other reviews.

To me it’s not a bad price, but there are definitely some very competitive options that I might look at, for example if you pay just a few hundred dollars more you can get a Canon t6 which is very good camera.

So overall the Canon t6 isn’t a bad little camera, and for beginners, it’ll be a lot of fun to learn on. If you’ve never owned a dslr this is a good camera to learn on, but if you want to go a little further with your dslr, I’d definitely be looking at a camera like the Canon t6i or t6s.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to Use with Gorgeous Results!
reviews.reviewText: I am new to photography so I was hesitant to drop a large sum of money on something that I may or may not have understand how to use, but I am extremely pleased with this purchase. This camera is amazingly powerful but simplifies everything so that even a newbie photographer like myself could figure it out on day 1. The photos come out so crisp and clear, even on auto settings. Changing around the manual settings is very user friendly and the results are always spectacular. The camera itself is fairly lightweight (even with a lens attached) and is comfortable to hold without being awkward. The different settings make capturing different types of shots so easy! Action, nighttime, indoor, outdoors, this camera can do it all! Plus the built in wi-fi and NFC make sharing photos and transferring them to your phone or PC a snap! I highly recommend saving a bit and buying refurbished, I haven't had any issues with mine and you can put the money you save towards accessories or a new lens. This comes with everything you need to get started: the camera, a basic lens, lens caps, user manual, and camera strap. If you are just getting into photography, you won't regret purchasing this camera!

Not the best but I prefer it over Nikon. The battery is unpredictable.If you want high quality photos save some money and invest in the 800 range. Recording does not work. Buy from the real website not amazon.

reviews.reviewTitle: Everything you could want in a beginner camera!
reviews.reviewText:
I am going to break this review into 2 main sections: 1) A refurbished camera and same day delivery 2) The camera itself.

1) Simply put the Camera appears to be brand new. I could not find the slightest bit of wear on it whatsoever. Understand that this doesn't mean that you will get the same product. Each one is different. But the one I got is spot on and looks like it has never been used. The second part of this is that it qualified for same-day delivery, which was a first for us. Understand that when you get same-day delivery they have until 9 pm to deliver it. Mine was delivered at 745pm. Now this was fine and it cost neothing extra for us to do it as we are prime members. Mostly a convience thing and was pretty neat that I ordered it at 8 in the morning and got it less than 12 hours later.

2) The Camera itself. I read some other reviews about it coming just thrown in a box. Mine was neatly wrapped in bubble wrap...and I mean a lot of bubble wrap. All of the components were in working order. Again the Body and lense look like they have never been used. The strap was still in factory packaging as was the battery and charger. Having already shot a few hundred photos with it, I simply love it. I have been out of the photography world long enough that the last time I was active in it I developed my own photos in a dark room. With the advances to DSLR Tech I wanted to get back into the game, mostly for fun. After a lot of research, realised that buying the latest and greatest gee-whiz camera wasn't going to be the route I wanted to take. Needless to say while searching I found this. It was a good deal and came with everything needed to take photos out of the box. It really has a lot of features that are wonderful to bridge the gap between begginer and a little more advanced. By no means would I consider this a professional camera. If you want one of those you need to add another 0 to the end of the price on this.

All in all I am extremly happy with the purchase and would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to get their feet wet in the photography world.

This arrived on time however the box the camera was shopped was smashed on one side. However I am giving it 5 stars as the camera was in EXCELLENT condition, as advertised. Been working perfectly for months now with zero issues! VERY SATISFIED

I love this camera. I keep seeing reviews about it being a step above a smartphone camera. It's much better than that. I've been a photographer for a long time and this camera is more than I expected. Professional or just starting out, it's perfect both ways. It's easy to use, but I am still learning it's more advanced features. Also, being a refurbished one , it's like it's brand new, you can't tell. It's packaging was like it was never opened. This camera was worth every penny. I highly recommend it.

This camera is perfect for beginners, it provides the photographer with high quality photo resolutions, accessories such as a neck strap, 15-35mm lense and a battery. This is my first camera and i'm not disappointed with what I received.

reviews.reviewTitle: Im very happy with the quality pictures of this camera
reviews.reviewText: Im very happy with the quality pictures of this camera, the only down side to this is that is has no external mic jack.. so if your looking for a camera mainly for video, this is not for you.
Perfect in every way. Pictures and video are superb. Grab an extra battery and grip if you plan on shooting for more than an hour.

So I bought this as a gift for my teenage daughter's birthday. She's an amateur photographer so I wanted to get her something nice, but not spend a fortune, just in case. Its a beautiful camera that takes amazing photos. I couldn't have asked for more. Its refurbished, but looks brand new. It came with everything needed, minus the bag and tripod ( which I also bought from Amazon). We used the camera on a trip to the beach and got some stunning shots. Its a great camera for a beginner. I would highly recommend.

This product was purchased as refurbished. However, few months after the purchase there were issues with focusing and it seems it lost its auto focus sensitivity. One more reason not to buy refurbished.

I was a little hesitant about buying a refurbished camera, but it works like brand new. I tried all of the function buttons, lens mounting, menu items, initial setup and battery and charger. Everything if perfect. I replaced my 15 year old Canon Rebel, which is still going strong, with the T6 because almost everything on the camera is setup the same. The two or three buttons that were new I looked up in the manual. I am very happy with this camera.
I also bought a refurbished Canon T6 for my Granddaughter for Christmas. It is working equally well. She is new to SLR cameras, but is picking up on manipulating the settings with ease.

reviews.reviewTitle: This camera is amazing. Perfect quality
reviews.reviewText: This camera is amazing. Perfect quality, definitely worth it, got delivered in just 2 days. I love this camera now. BUY THIS CAMERA NOW!!!!

I was recommended this camera by a close family relative who does photography. This camera is great! I bought a separate lens to enhance the image quality just a tad and it makes a great difference, however just the camera itself is still GREAT to familiarize yourself with the layout of operating it. It is tricky but with patience and research, you can learn to use this camera within a week and start taking amazing shots.

My camera seems completely brand new. I now take MUCH BETTER pictures than what I was able to accomplish with my phone. I'm not a professional photographer, but this camera makes me look like one.

Be aware that if you have your WiFi/NFC function enabled, your computer won't acknowledge that the camera is connected with the cable. I was worried that my camera was broken, but it turns out that's just how its been manufactured to function.

reviews.reviewTitle: Anyway the price was terrific and the camera was like absolutely 100% brand new
reviews.reviewText: I was wanting to buy a T6i and, apparently, the t6 is also listed under the product title. Anyway the price was terrific and the camera was like absolutely 100% brand new.

I took this camera out of the box and it looked like it had never been used before. It came with all essential pieces, including the camera body, lens, battery, battery charger, and cord to hook up to the computer. I purchased my own 64 GB SD card to go inside. I’ve never owned a fancy camera before and wanted something easy to use. I took this camera right out of the box and was able to take pretty good photos right away! Highly recommend for anyone looking to get more into photography but doesn’t want to commit to dropping $500+ on a nice camera. With the lens included, this is an amazing deal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product, but the battery can't keep a charge.
reviews.reviewText: Everything is refurbished great! Other than the fact than the battery mine came with can't hold a charge to save its life... Literally charged it overnight for only half full, while friends of mine who bought this new have theirs fully charged in less than 2 to 3 hours. I will update this if LIQUID DEALS fixes my situation, or at least gives me some form of reply. Expect something wrong from a refurbished product though, don't hold the merchandise accountable hold the sellers accountable.
I love the camera, specially I can hook with my cellphone and I can take pictures from there and download in my device as well

reviews.reviewTitle: Light, easy to use, great for beginners. Don’t be scared of the (renewed) part.
reviews.reviewText: I have to say, I was nervous buying a refurbished camera. It came in a brand new-looking box and honestly looked like it had never been used. I’ve been using it what feels like non-stop for over a week now and the picture quality is great. I used to have a T3i and this one feels so much lighter. I also like that it does NOT have a pop-out screen. I never used it anyway and it just made the camera bulkier. All the lenses I used on my T3i work with this camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good first real camera for beginners
reviews.reviewText: Looks brand new and has everything that should be there. Although I thought it would include an SD, which it did not, but that's cheap and easy to buy so that's not a problem for me. This is my first "real" camera and I'll say it's definitely worth the price! The quality so far is great! I can't wait to play with it more and explore it's features. I plan on using the camera for YouTube and I think it'll be good. I'm going to go over the manual so I can get more familiar and I can't wait! So far, so good!!!

This is my first DSLR and so far I am impressed. I highly recommend this camera. The item arrived in mint condition and all the settings works. Built around an 18MP APS-C sensor, the T6 offers Wi-Fi with NFC for easy photo sharing when you're out-and-about, and adds a faster processor . The only thing I wish is available for this is the ability to turn off shutter but I know most DSLRs doesn't have that because of mirror.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mainly that the memory is needed to use the camera; 8 to 32 GB will get you going. The manual is a friend.
reviews.reviewText: All was accurate in my Canon Camera order; its working well. thanks to Amazon ordering system. I only had to order A fast memory Card. This Camera is nearly all self contained having an on board Flash, and the price is great as well.

For an older camera this has gone far beyond what I thought capable. This camera is the best investment of my life I’ve always wanted to buy one and I finally just did it. It’s inexpensive compared to other brand new camera but if your just getting your feet wet this camera will be great with some new lenses look at these shots i got with new lenses this camera speaks for itself.

I am incredibly satisfied with this camera. It came packaged safely and neatly in its original Canon box with all of the accessories. Nothing got damaged in transit. As I was unpacking, I couldn’t even tell that this camera had been previously owned/refurbished. Every part of everything in the box was in mint condition.
The ease of use of this camera is what drew me to purchase it. This is perfect for a vacation or an event. It’s super easy to pull it out and flick the on switch and it’s ready to go. My favorite feature is the WiFi and NFC capabilities. I can easily transfer a photo that I’ve taken on this camera to my cell phone. I am way surprised with the ease of use of this camera. I bought it becaus I favor Canon. I highly recommend this camera to anyone on the fence between models or brands.

I bought this for a trip to Peru. It is a great camera with lots of features, but simple to use for the amateur. The lens provided didn't zoom in as much as I'd like so I'm going to purchase a more versatile lens. Wish I would have bought this sooner for other trips.

Also, should mention that the battery life is exceptional. I bought an extra set of batteries but never needed to change them out over 10 days and 600 pictures.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best budget upgrade from your Smartphone!
reviews.reviewText: What a great camera. Here was my dilemma... I wanted to get a good camera that would take better pictures than my iPhone XR. I’m new to photography so I wanted a camera that I could play with new settings to continue to progress In the quality of pictures that I take. For $330 I think this camera is a steal! I’ve enjoyed every second of this camera. Tons of things I still need to learn, but being a budget DLSR camera I’d say this is a wonderful beginner camera! Not to mention the WiFi connectivity is the coolest thing!! It allows you to view and download all your pictures straight to your phone which can be really convenient bypassing the use of the SD card + computer. Also you can use your smartphone as a remote to see the view of the camera and take pictures. Love this camera!

I'm old school, but this guy has all manual operations just for me! But just for fun I let it select the appropriate setting on automatic mode, we'll it knows photography, we agreed about 85 percent of the time, the other 15 percent was I did not want any background or some special shot, so if your film type then this is your new technology camera. I'm very happy with it, now my Pentax Spotmatic II is not happy sitting in the old camera bag waiting for a roll of 35mm film.

Bought refurbished and it works like new. I've held off on completing the review until I had adequate experience and time getting used to the camera (purchased over 2 years ago). The Wi-Fi feature is great and makes transferring the images to your smartphone a breeze. I've recommended to other family members who have subsequently purchased and will continue to highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: These guys are doing GREAT WORK with refurbishing!
reviews.reviewText: BEAUTIFUL CAMERA! Like brand new! There are all kinds of wonderful features like live shoot through your phone?! I’m still a novice photographer but this camera is super easy to learn and figure out and such beautiful photos it can produce

I highly recommend this camera for any beginner out there. It is very handy and it is very easy to get the hang of all of the buttons and what they do exactly. This camera takes excellent pictures and I am very impressed. The package was very secure and came with everything needed. I love this camera. I am in a photography class and a camera is needed to participate of course. This was a very good buy and I will be using it for way more things about than photography projects. A great family friendly camera!

Second time I have bought a refurbished Canon EOS rebel T6 camera from this seller. Both experiences have been excellent, the product is excellent, like new. It doesn’t look like it’s ever been and it works like a gem. Couldn’t be more pleased with this camera and the accessories that came with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... the camera a day earlier than promised which was great because this was a gift for my 12 year ...
reviews.reviewText: We received the camera a day earlier than promised which was great because this was a gift for my 12 year old son. He promptly tried it out and showed me all of the features. He is mainly using it for nature shots and for indoor filming for YouTube. He is very happy with the features and the quality of the photo and videos both look good both indoor and outdoor.

Just recently received my camera and I popped the battery and sim card in and it took wonderful pictures but whenever I charged my battery to full the next time I went to take pictures and it was just a black screen that showed up it would take the pictures but I could not see them on my screen and after a while of turning it off and on the main screen finally showed up. This problem happens every time I charge my battery. Any ideas on what it could be or how to fix it?

reviews.reviewTitle: is lightweight and easy to handle- I like it just as well as ...
reviews.reviewText: This was the first refurbished camera I have ever purchased. It is perfect- no marks, full equipment, works perfectly, warranty included, is lightweight and easy to handle- I like it just as well as my Nikon 5100. Great camera.
There's no way you would know this was refurbished at all. Perfectly packaged included all paperwork. Wonderful Christmas present! Works like grand new also!

Everything was perfect. Unboxed and inventoried. Everything was well packaged and all pieces were included. Charged the battery up and took several pictures in most modes. Pictures are sharp and well focused. Great buy from a great vender...

So far everything is great and I am enjoying learning about the camera. Love the WiFi option especially because it appears the cord to connect to the computer does not work! Unsure if that is part of the warranty but I will have to find out. All in all great camera and so far great service.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... am a newbie with cameras/photography and this was a great starter camera
reviews.reviewText: I am a newbie with cameras/photography and this was a great starter camera. It takes nice photos and has a lot of cool features. I am still learning so I can't give too much of an in depth review, but it does take precise photos.

Great service and terrific product.
I am having a wonderful time learning more and more about it.
Thanks for
Always throwing up a busy signal and won’t let me take pictures!!

Amazing! I can't even tell it is refurbished. It is so clean, lens is immaculate. I got the eCostConnection Camera Bag that was only $8 to go along with it, it fit perfect, had storage for lens and chargers and was cheap! I recommend it if you get this camera to protect it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very great beginner to advanced camera
reviews.reviewText: Very great beginner to advanced camera. I use it for the Property of Jellystone Pictures that we publish on everything from websites to our brochures. With the auto focus and super fast shutter speed this is the perfect camera to capture those one of a kind pictures.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s quite difficult to understand for amateur but definitely the best quality photos in my opinion
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this camera for quite some time now as a first user. It’s quite difficult to understand for amateur but definitely the best quality photos in my opinion. I did have to read the manual to understand how to use it better and it’s definitely a good first camera for first time users!

Picked this camera up for shooting products for sale on line as well as for some fun amateur photography out in nature. It has worked flawlessly thus far. The lens it comes with is versatile and a great place to start with digital photography.
Mine camera came with a spot in the sensor. I'm not sure if I'm buying refurbished stuff again.
Great camera. Takes unbelievable pictures. Highly recommend picking up a zoom lens.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great beginner camera, no Bluetooth for remote shutter
reviews.reviewText: Amazing camera, super upset to find out that this camera doesn’t allow Bluetooth capability so you can’t use a remote for the shutter. I wouldn’t recommend It because of that

Very good camera for a beginner. The only thing I would like to see improved is the range of focus, but that has more to do with the lens that's being used rather than the camera itself. All and all a very good starter camera.
I liked the camera but the auto focus on low light is just horrible, if you taking photos in a place with good light or outdoor itll be perfect, but low light ( not so low) it was a disaster...
Such a great camera for a beginner like myself. I needed something that would take better pictures than my iPhone and was affordable too. Perfect for bloggers or anyone new to photography!

This is a wonderful camera that I got for my daughter and she loves it. She has always had cheaper and smaller cameras and is excited for something that will take better quality photos and gives her more options for taking the photos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it. I have absolutely nothing to dislike about ...
reviews.reviewText:
Love it. I have absolutely nothing to dislike about it. Take beautiful photos and handles lowlight pretty well although I’d recommend using a tripod because it gets a little shaky in lowlight.
Still amazing camera overall.
Bought this camera to take wedding photos. Great clear pics!!! Used bounce flash for perfect indoor lighting.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Great product at a great price. My college daughter loved it Christmas morning. Packaged well and works perfectly. Thank you!!!
I'm glad I bought this camera...it works great, and I love that the lenses I had from older models work with it. It arrived pretty fast, and I live in a remote area, so that's saying something.

Stopped working 3 days after 90 day warranty was up... great camera but I purchased it for a trip and it stopped working the very first day. Huge disappointment and now I am spending $200 to have it repaired through canon...

I've just started getting into photography/videography and this camera does the trick! It takes amazing photos and pretty good quality videos if you set up the settings just right. I used some youtube videos to help me get the most out of my settings. The wifi app transferring is so easy to get straight to instagram etc.
I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking to step up from a phone to a beginner camera!

reviews.reviewTitle: WiFi is for picture only NOT video
reviews.reviewText: Good quality not a scratch on it. Note that you cannot use the WiFi connection for videos only pictures.

I was debating what camera to buy and whether to get a mirrorless, a Nikon , a more advanced model but in the end I went with this. Yes, the camera came in a mislabeled box but I received what I ordered and that's what matters to me. So far this camera has done good things for me and I also purchased a 50mm lens to go with it.

I've started with a Canon power shot camera this is my 4th upgrade I am very happy with the camera a lot of functions will familiarize definitely. Some folks have bought this as their first camera good pictures.

Pretty good camera but takes a lot of shots before I get a photo I like. Anyone know why almost all my photos are super blurry? Like the subject has to be completely still for it to turn out okay and it takes AGES to focus before it even takes a photo...
Love the bluetooth transfer function. I can upload to my phone in a snap. Also love that like classic Canon cameras, ALL of my specialty lenses fit

I’m in love with this. Given this is my first camera I like it a lot. Photos don’t blur (I had my kid dance all crazy and the photo was crystal clear) The view finder is more comfortable than just a digital screen. The auto focus is great. The weight is nice and feels solid. This is an upgrade from a return I recently had and it’s so much better and I plan on keeping it. It’s awesome.
Good starter camera. Fairly self explanatory but hope to learn more about the advanced settings later. So far so good. I purchased a refurbished one and have had no issues.
it’s a great a camera takes great pictures mine came the next day! A little scratch on the lense but works amazing
Shipping was fast and product was as described. I am very happy with this camera and would recommend it to other newbie photographers.

This is a great camera. But a word of advice; buy it from Amazon and not directly from Canon if you want good customer service. I just learned this harsh lesson the hard way. A few dollars more on Amazon is well worth it.

Enough with the ran... Now the review:

This is a great camera for what I do and I believe it will be just fine for most people. This camera replaced my Canon AE-1P which was one of the best 35mm cameras of it's day and believe it or not is still being use. If you still have a Canon AE-1P I encourage you to find a user's group. For fast action shots like insects and arachnids it is still hard to beat 35mm film and the Canon AE-1P. The only reason I am going digital at all is, it is very hard to find someone to develop 35MM film. And when you do, they normally scan it with a crappy scanner so your prints look terrible. I do not know of anyone who still develops 35mm film and uses real photo paper.

First off read the manual it will make life a lot simpler. Then go to the website and download the Canon software. You will not regret these simple steps. If you have not bought your camera yet, make sure you buy a simple UV filter and lens cap keeper with your order. The UV filter is to protect the lens. It is better to damage a $5.99 UV filter than the lens itself. If you drop your lens cap in the woods or on a street in down town tourist city USA you are never going to see it again in most cases.

I went through all the modes on the camera and I could not find a single one I did not like. The best feature is MANUAL Mode and Program with manual settings. The autofocus is nice and all and the automatic presets are nice but they pale in comparison to setting the camera manually. You get much better pictures when using manual settings no matter what camera you use. In most cases it is hard to see the differencein the picture quality. This is only really important if you have to shoot a subject that is tiny and very close. Autofocus has a limited close range and the fact that you can focus manually is very important. In low light the presets will take a decent picture. However through manual settings you can pull out more detail.

The Continuous shooting mode has a respectable rate. It is not as good as the Nikon D3400 however as this camera cost around $100.00 less, that is ok. I have shot a few flies in flight and it was just fine. If I needed something more I would simply dial in movie mode. and take a video.

Setting the ISO vs Auto: In bright sunlight there is not a noticeable difference. However at night there is a huge difference. This is something you either have to practice a lot or take a class to get right. The good news is that with the T6 you can change the ISO. For me that is important because most spiders come out at night.

Did I mention that I am a armature wildlife photographer specializing in spiders? Well yes, that is what I do in my spare time. This camera is great for low light or total darkness.

This camera is super lightweight. This is important if you have to carry it for long distances. Yes there are "better, heavier" cameras out there but when you are miles out in a national park having a lightweight camera will serve you a lot better. And if Joe Bear or Molly Wolverine decides to make a meal of you, lightweight is a life saver. This camera is not expensive. So if a bear eats it you are not out of a lot of money.

Pros Cons
Light weight Cannot take the beating of an AE-1P
Has a view Finder When in movie mode switches the view finder off and uses LCD
Can switch to the LCD screen Only 18 Megapixel and you need around 20-24 to match 35MM film
Has lots of manual settings Not weather proof - Please remember this
Warranty even covers refurbs No external Microphone jack
It is a Canon and operates like a Canon Shutter release feels a bit awkward at first
Has a great built in flash
Can take a hotshoe flash
Has optional remote control
Can be remote controlled from a cell phone or computer
Has WiFi
Easy to use
Decent Autofocus but also allows manual focus.
Interchangeable lens
Can record sounds
Can use the flash as an autofocus assist in total darkness.

In closing the only real limits to the T6 is the lens you put on it. Better lens means better pictures. A cheap lens will drag down a good camera. The stock lens that comes with it is a cheap lens. I will order a better lens in a few weeks. However the lens that comes with the camera is good enough. I would not want to take a very expensive camera into a swamp to take pictures of spiders to post online. 18 megapixels is more than enough for web content. In fact the amount of megapixel is really only important if you have to enlarge the picture. It means I can be a bit further away and then enlarge the picture to get a nice image. A telephoto lens will solve that problem.

This camera will not break the bank so if it gets destroyed because you misjudged how fast an alligator can run (I did that once) and have to feed it your camera as you run away screaming and waving your arms, you can easily buy another one. I cannot speak for portrait photographers as I am not one, but I plan to take some classes and see how this camera performs.

From casual shooting to wildlife photography you cannot go wrong with a T6. It is fast enough to capture moving objects but I doubt it will stop a bullet in flight. It cannot make your spelling, grammar or typing better either so don't judge me. But it will get the job done and if you are lucky enough to land a gig with a magazine it should be good enough.

I included some pictures of spiders I took this morning. I just got the Camera 3 days ago and I have taken 249 pictures and 3 videos. The battery is still charged fully.

Cheers

I am not a professional photographer- I take pictures of my kid and of my friends and family as a hobby. I had been using a Nikon D3400 usually with a 50mm (f/1.8?) lens. I always had it on manual focus and I had learned the camera and was getting pretty good at it. My sister decided she wanted the Nikon so after research I decided to buy this one, with the reviews of the faster and better autofocus than the Nikon being the main selling point. I thought maybe this would help trying to get those clear pictures of my toddler.
I’ve had this for a few weeks and again purchased a 50mm f/1.8 lens for more “portrait” type photography. So maybe I need more time to adjust but I am not a fan of the autofocus. It never seems to select the right point. You can manually select which area you want to be in focus but that kind of defeats the purpose for me. Maybe once I learn to do that faster..
So I tried manual focus and absolutely hate it on this camera. I think I just need more practice with the autofocus.
I should mention that I never use it in auto mode. Usually when trying to get those close up, clear pictures I shoot in Av mode so I can set my aperture as low as I want.
I do love the WiFi feature that the Nikon didn’t have. It greatly speeds up the process of transferring pictures.
I also seem to like the kit lens better on this camera.
Maybe in a few months I will come back and update how I’m doing with this new camera, but this is my first impression just as someone who has been using a basic DSLR like this without any formal education.
Overall, I do think it’s a good camera especially for the price and I would probably buy again.

The picture of the dog was with the Canon and the cake was with the Nikon.

Update: I love it more than my Nikon now. I learned some new things about it and also took it off some portrait setting it came on that is supposed to soften skin, which was making my pictures look strange in my opinion. I also set it to back button focus- SO much easier. I have been shooting in manual mode with great success. So glad I went with reviews and got a Canon this time. Great value. Updating to 5 stars.

Amazing camara the quality of the pictures and videos is amazing i love it. I love the fact that is not heavy to carry arround And its a great camara for beginners specially when you are not so familiar about taking good pictures you can just leave it in the automatic setting that it brings and pictures are still amazing. Just with a touch on the screen you can transfer the pictures to the phone or computer amazing product once again and it was more than what I expected oh and the lense is super easy to put on or take it off

Canon has always been one of my top brands of cameras. My family has always used Sony so I thought it would be interesting to try Canon for once to see how I would like it. I have had my Canon T6 for about a year now and still use it often. I mainly use it for my business photos and it lives up to my expectations. Has plenty of different settings to find the perfect match for what you’re shooting. The shutter isn’t as fast as some of my other cameras but it still gets some good action pics. This is a good entry-level camera for any beginner so be sure to check it out and you can surely capture some ‘captivating’ shots with the Canon T6.

Very Easy to use. Great colors, that’s what Canon cameras are known for. ISO performance is meh. Autofocus is garbage, would love to have Dual Pixel AF. Very Good battery life surprisingly, did a whole day of shooting photos and videos in just one battery(genuine canon battery not the cheap crappy ones). The build quality may look cheap, however, the body is durable and has good grip. If you take some time to study the chemistry of settings and stuff like that, and you stay away from them dreadful auto setting modes, you’ll have satisfying photos that will definetely stand out!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Camera. Definitely buy an extra lens.
reviews.reviewText: The lens it comes with is ok. I highly recommend getting a telescopic and macro lens along with it. Video quality is good, but the focus on the lens it came with was poor. Very loud and took forever on AF. I recommend this camera to people that are new to photography or want a very comfortable camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: I don’t have to spend a fortune on photographers anymore!
reviews.reviewText: I love getting pictures of my kids taken because they’re only little for a little while. Now with that said, a professional photographer can be really pricey. My husband got me this camera for Christmas and it has been amazing! I’m in love with it. I was able to take some (late) Christmas pictures, birthday pictures and I took some valentines pictures as well, plus tons of random pictures at the park and any other time they were looking cute. They look just like the ones that I’d be paying someone else hundreds of dollars for. It’s easy to use and you have lots of options. If the settings scare you a little like it did me at first just stick with portrait mode for a little while. I can’t say enough great things about this camera.

I have loved this camera! This is such a great beginner camera because it makes it really easy to understand all your settings. I have been using this camera body along with a 50mm 1.8 lens and it has been working wonderfully!

This is a photo taking camera it is not good for videos! The built in mic is not good and you can’t attach a external microphone. The Cannon rebel T6i is better for videos because that has a flip screen and this one doesn’t.
Looks brand new. Works great but i’ve only had it for a couple of days so i haven’t used it much.
The camera doesn’t work well for portraits. Otherwise, it’s a nice camera.
I started to take pictures. I believe this machine could be a good start
Good

reviews.reviewTitle: I've been having fun every since I bought this camera
reviews.reviewText: I've been having fun every since I bought this camera, and God has used It to open a wide door of opportunities.for me
Wonderful pictures.Such detail.
This is by far the best camera out there !
love the canon Eos it has everything on it and that I wanted in a camera too

How can this camera have no autofocus when shooting video?

You could buy a $20 camera with this feature. What a joke.

reviews.reviewTitle: And I would love to promote this product
reviews.reviewText: Hey! I own a popular YouTube channel and an even more popular Instagram account! And I would love to promote this product! I used to own a canon and loved it! Unfortunately it is now outdated but I am looking for a new camera! And I feel as if this is the one!

This camera is a great Mid-Range tool to take some awesome photos. Lots of ways you can adjust the aperture and speed of the shutter to achieve the perfect shot even with dim light. The Auto-Focus works great for videos and anti-shack technology works great. I personally would call it the best camera for the money

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice camera with lots of features
reviews.reviewText: The camera is in very nice condition and it takes great photos but sadly my cameras flash doesn’t work so I might have to get it replaced but the touchscreen camera has all the features you would need in and the lens is manual adjust not the digital focus so it makes better quality photos must get item
Gift for my wife, she loves the camera.
LOVE MY CAMERA
love! works so good!
